TaskName: Gradual-onset continuous performance task with face stimuli
TaskDescription: This is a processed output file. The experiment was run by Matlab and Psychtoolbox.
Levels: onset: the onset of the first trial is recorded
duration: trial duration (1 s), a trial consists of transition (0.8 s) and intact (0.2 s) stimulus presentations
image_id: 11 unique faces in total, images 1-10 are nontarget faces and image 11 is a target face
transition_duration: upon the onset of the trial, the stimulus from the previous trial gradually transitioned to the stimulus from the current trial in a linear pixel-by-pixel interpolation
resp_1st: 1-button press recorded, 0-no button press recorded
resp_2nd: 1-in case where two button presses are recorded in a trial
rt_1st: response time of the 1st button press
rt_2nd: response time of the 2nd button press
acc: 1-hit and correct rejection, 0-false alarm and miss
